sentences.en: A normal beholder can become a wizard or sorcerer.
sentences.cn: 正常的眼魔都可以成为法师或术士.

sentences.en: And of course, " beauty is in the eye of the beholder . "
sentences.cn: 当然, 我们每个人的 审美观 都有所不同.

sentences.en: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
Beauty is in the eyes of the beholder. ( Aesop )
sentences.cn: 美存在于欣赏者的眼中. ( 伊索 )

sentences.en: Beauty is relative to the beholder's eye.
sentences.cn: 美和观者的眼光有关系.

sentences.en: But the lesson stuck with me -- "extensible" is in the eye of the beholder.
sentences.cn: 但我得到了经验 —— “可扩展的”是在旁观者的眼中的。

sentences.en: Eye of the Beholder looks as ludicrous as It'sounds.
sentences.cn: 《守护者》这部电影就象它的片名一样滑稽可笑.

sentences.en: Flight ( Ex ): A beholder's body is naturally buoyant.
sentences.cn: 飞行 ( 异 ) 眼魔的躯体天生就能飘浮.

sentences.en: Happiness is in the perspective of beholder.
sentences.cn: 快乐就在于个人的看法.

sentences.en: In some ways, clean code -- like beauty -- is in the eye of the beholder.
sentences.cn: 在一定程度上，干净的代码——像漂亮一样——就是在旁观者眼中所留下的印象。

sentences.en: It has been said that art is a tryst , for in the joy of it maker and beholder meet.
sentences.cn: 有人说艺术是一种幽会, 因为艺术家和欣赏者可在幽会的乐趣中相遇在一起.

sentences.en: Its meaning had been in the eyes of beholder all along.
sentences.cn: 这个意义始终看在旁观者眼里.
先决条件: 真眼魔或类眼魔.

sentences.en: Prerequisite: True beholder or must have aberration as a favored enemy.
sentences.cn: 先决条件: 真眼魔,或必须以异怪为宿敌.

sentences.en: Spells: A beholder mage gains the ability to cast arcane spells.
sentences.cn: 法术: 眼魔法师获得施展奥法的能力.

sentences.en: The basic body type comprises a great variety of beholder subspecies.
sentences.cn: 眼魔亚种极多,基本形象各不相同.

sentences.en: The caves cannot but inspire wonder in the beholder.
sentences.cn: 这些洞穴让观者无不叹为观止。

sentences.en: You have to ask: Are the competencies they project valid, or are they merely in the eyes of the beholder?
sentences.cn: 你要问:他们规划的能力是合格的吗或者,仅仅是因为旁观者清吗?

trans.tran_en: The beholder of something is the person who is looking at it
